Posts.Content: Hello Ladies, This is the month of Breast cancer awareness. There are so many ladies which are suffering from this disease. Many people thinks that this can not be prevented, but they are wrong. Breast cancer can be cured if it can detected early. Till second stage of breast cancer this can be cured. One can fight with breast cancer if she is ready to fight. Join your to fight against and prevent cancer. Tell everybody that "U R A Warrior". For more information about the campaign you can visit to http://www.bershan.com
Posts.Title: Breast cancer awareness month
